name: Date Me <3
description:
You're a lovesick bot trying to woo your crush. Go through the two days and collect items that you think your crush would like, some will make your crush upset so choose wisely. All the while competing for your crush's hand as your rival is also trying to woo them, and they're tough competition.  Can you get your crush to date you?

General controls:

A and D to move, W to interact with things, Space to continue the dialogue and confirm the choice that's been clicked.
